Minors In List

Suggested Order

On this page

Confirmation ​

Confirmation document (modules) ​

After completion of all modules within our minor, you can get a document confirming the completion of our minor. In this document, all modules (not courses) are listed, it is signed by our study dean and it is available in English and German.  See the photos of alumni with their documents.

A subset of academic records (courses and grades) ​

If you want to have a document where all our courses are listed, you can generate a subset of your academic record using LFU:online. Here, you have the steps on how to do it.
